title: Problem 2159_A
statement: This is an interactive problem. There is a secret sequence a_1, a_2, ..., a_{2n-1},a_{2n}, which contains each integer from 1 to n exactly twice.Your task is to guess the sequence by using queries of the following type: "? k\;j_1\;j_2\;...\;j_k" — select the integer k (1 ≤ k ≤ 2n) and k distinct indices j_1, j_2, ..., j_k (1 ≤ j_1 , j_2 , ... , j_k ≤ 2n).
